posts.post_content:
-Sold- This is for a nice group of 122 raw T206's.  Cards are in a range of conditions from poor to vg/ex with the majority being good+.  There are quite a few hofers in the group.  $2,125 shipped.  Paypal is preferred, other methods of payment are accepted. E-mail with any questions. [url]aaroncerin@aol.com[/url] 

Thanks for looking.

[url]http://picasaweb.google.com/erinconyers/T206#[/url]
I would like to be the first in line if the deal doesn't work.
